member.name: T:de_Calculator.Calculator
member.summary: Calculator class containing the numerical operation methods.

member.name: M:de_Calculator.Calculator.Add(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Takes the base number and adds the second number to it.

member.name: M:de_Calculator.Calculator.Subtract(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Takes the base number and subtracts the second number from it.

member.name: M:de_Calculator.Calculator.Multiply(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Takes the base number and multiplies it by the second number.

member.name: M:de_Calculator.Calculator.Divide(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Takes the base number and divides it by the second number. Cannot divide by 0.
